components.description: The letter B, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter B

components.description:
The letter V, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.

Previously this emoji incorrectly depicted the letter U when displayed in isolation on Samsung devices. This was corrected in January 2020.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter V

description: The flag for Bouvet Island, which may show as the letters BV on some platforms. This is the same flag as Norway.
title: Flag: Bouvet Island

emoji_net_data.definition: The flag for Bouvet Island, which may show as the lettersÂ BVÂ on some platforms.Â This is the same flag as Norway. The Flag for Bouvet Island  http://emojipedia.org/flag-for-bouvet-island/
emoji_net_data.name: Bouvet Island

bn:00034960n: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design

bn:00012455n: Uninhabited volcanic island in the South Atlantic Ocean.
An uninhabited South Atlantic sub-Antarctic volcanic island
A Norwegian uninhabited volcanic island in the South Atlantic Ocean, south-southwest of the South African Cape of Good Hope.
Bouvet Island is an uninhabited subantarctic volcanic island and dependency of Norway located in the South Atlantic Ocean at.
An island belonging to Norway in the South Atlantic near the Antarctic Circle
Uninhabited island in the South Atlantic, a dependency of Norway.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
